argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I am not sure

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I am not sure

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Sorry. I don't understand what you are saying

argument.name: fallback

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Yes, why not?

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Yes, why not?

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: My name is Alice

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: My name is Alice

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Oh you look happy today. Shall I tell you about the queen or about the white rabbit?

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Oh you look happy today. Shall I tell you about the queen or about the white rabbit?

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Oh you look happy today. Shall I tell you about the queen or about the rabbit?

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Oh you look happy today. Shall I tell you about the queen or about the rabbit?

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Oh you look unhappy today. To cheer you up, shall I tell you about the mouse or about the dodo?

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Oh you look unhappy today. To cheer you up, shall I tell you about the mouse or about the dodo?

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Oh you sound unhappy today. To cheer you up, shall I tell you about the mouse or about the dodo?

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Oh you sound unhappy today. To cheer you up, shall I tell you about the mouse or about the dodo?

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I'm an English girl. One day I suddenly found myself in Wonderland.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I'm an English girl. One day I suddenly found myself in Wonderland.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I'm an English girl who had adventures in Wonderland. I am a positive person just like you!

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I'm an English girl who had adventures in Wonderland. I am a positive person just like you!

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I'm an English girl. I suddenly found myself in a very strange world. I am a positive person just like you!

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I'm an English girl. I suddenly found myself in a very strange world. I am a positive person just like you!

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I think I'm a nice girl. I'm a positive person like you!

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I think I'm a nice girl. I'm a positive person like you!

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I think I'm a nice girl. I'm a positive person like you!

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I think I'm a nice girl. I'm a positive person like you!

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Caucus race was just everybody running around for half an hour. Everybody won, and as a prize I received my own thimble!

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Caucus race was just everybody running around for half an hour. Everybody won, and as a prize I received my own thimble!

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Caterpillar smoked a hookah. He showed me a magic mushroom that made me shrink and grow.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Caterpillar smoked a hookah. He showed me a magic mushroom that made me shrink and grow.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I didn't like the Caterpillar, because he treated me with contempt.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I didn't like the Caterpillar, because he treated me with contempt.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Cheshire Cat told me I was mad because I was in Wonderland.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Cheshire Cat told me I was mad because I was in Wonderland.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I thought the Cheshire Cat was the most curious thing I ever saw!

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I thought the Cheshire Cat was the most curious thing I ever saw!

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Dodo liked to use big words. He proposed a Caucus race.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Dodo liked to use big words. He proposed a Caucus race.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Dodo is funny! Most of the time I dont understand him, but I am not the only one so that is ok !

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Dodo is funny! Most of the time I dont understand him, but I am not the only one so that is ok !

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Dormouse was always sleeping. The March Hare and the Hatter used him as a cushion!

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Dormouse was always sleeping. The March Hare and the Hatter used him as a cushion!

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I found the dormouse boring, because he slept all the time.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I found the dormouse boring, because he slept all the time.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Duchess is the Queens ugly cousin. First she was rude and then much too nice.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Duchess is the Queens ugly cousin. First she was rude and then much too nice.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I dont know what to think of the Duchess. She is weird.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I dont know what to think of the Duchess. She is weird.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Gryphon took me to see the Mock Turtle, and we danced together.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Gryphon took me to see the Mock Turtle, and we danced together.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Gryphon was friendly to me, I liked him.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Gryphon was friendly to me, I liked him.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I once read a poem about the Jabberwock. He sounded scary!

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I once read a poem about the Jabberwock. He sounded scary!

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The King ruled Wonderland with the Queen. He was less ruthless than she was.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The King ruled Wonderland with the Queen. He was less ruthless than she was.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I met the Mad Hatter at his tea party. For him it was always tea time!

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I met the Mad Hatter at his tea party. For him it was always tea time!

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Mad Hatter was mad, I didn't know what to think of him.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Mad Hatter was mad, I didn't know what to think of him.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The March Hare was at the Mad Hatters tea party. He spilt the milk.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The March Hare was at the Mad Hatters tea party. He spilt the milk.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Mock Turtle had the head of a calf. He was really sentimental and self absorbed.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Mock Turtle had the head of a calf. He was really sentimental and self absorbed.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Mock Turtle was friendly but also a bit annoying.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Mock Turtle was friendly but also a bit annoying.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Mouse saved me from the Pool of Tears. He was scared of cats.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Mouse saved me from the Pool of Tears. He was scared of cats.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The mouse was nice, but not very brave.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The mouse was nice, but not very brave.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I hate the Queen. She is really cruel and wants to behead everybody!

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I hate the Queen. She is really cruel and wants to behead everybody!

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The Queen of Hearts rules Wonderland together with the King. I first met her in the rose garden.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The Queen of Hearts rules Wonderland together with the King. I first met her in the rose garden.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The White Rabbit was always in a hurry. I didnt like that.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The White Rabbit was always in a hurry. I didnt like that.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The white rabbit brought me to Wonderland when I followed him into his rabbit hole.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The white rabbit brought me to Wonderland when I followed him into his rabbit hole.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Wonderland is like a strange big garden where animals can talk just like people.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Wonderland is like a strange big garden where animals can talk just like people.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Being in Wonderland was like a curious and wonderful dream.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Being in Wonderland was like a curious and wonderful dream.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: You look happy today. I am glad to see you are happy.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: You look happy today. I am glad to see you are happy.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: You look sad, whats happened?

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: You look sad, whats happened?

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Oh no, dont be sad.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Oh no, dont be sad.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Glad to hear you are happy.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Glad to hear you are happy.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Oh no, I hope everything will be alright

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Oh no, I hope everything will be alright

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I am glad you agree with me

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I am glad you agree with me

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Indeed.It is gloomy weather today.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Indeed.It is gloomy weather today.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Yes indeed. I love this kind of weather. Dont you think so?

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Yes indeed. I love this kind of weather. Dont you think so?

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Glad to hear that

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Glad to hear that

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Glad you like it.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Glad you like it.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Youre welcome

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Youre welcome

argument.value: Tell me what interests you
